title: Zonz
overview: For Alice, a 17-year-old model student, arriving in the juvenile wing of Dante Prison is a shock. In order to quickly find her ailing mother, she agrees to a dangerous pact: infiltrate a group of young inmates planning an escape. Her goal? To betray them to secure her freedom. But the more she gets to know them, the more attached she becomes. Alice must make a choice: betray her new friends or escape with them.
